content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "375 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "190 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Empty jar of brownie mix into a large mixing bowl; stir to break up lumps.
3) Add 3/4 cup softened butter, 2 beaten eggs, and 2 teaspoons of vanilla extract; mix until well blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "3/4 cup softened butter"@7:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "2 beaten eggs"@32:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "2 teaspoons of vanilla extract"@51:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "mix"@83:86 / AC
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until well blended"@87:105 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Spread batter evenly in the prepared pan.
6) Allow to cool in the pan some before cutting into squares.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "cool"@12:16 / AC
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "the pan"@20:27 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-6-0 "before cutting into squares"@33:60 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
